Package imagingbook.pub.color.image

Class ColorStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.color.image.ColorStack
  • public abstract class ColorStack
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains only static methods for handling color images represented as multi-plane image stacks. The 3 components in all these images are assumed to be in [0,1].

      • createFrom

        public static ij.ImagePlus createFrom​(ij.ImagePlus imp)
        This static method creates a 3-slice float-stack from a RGB image
        Parameters:
        imp - the source (RGB) image.
        Returns:
        an image stack consisting of 3 slices of type float.
